intro: This Product User Manual (PUM) provides comprehensive documentation for the Riparian Zones Land Cover/Land Use (LC/LU) product within the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) Priority Area Monitoring component. It focuses on the 2012 and 2018 reference years, detailing the product's characteristics, methodology, potential applications, quality assessment, and technical specifications. The document serves as a guide for users seeking to understand and effectively utilise the Riparian Zones LC/LU dataset for environmental monitoring, policy support, and scientific research related to riparian ecosystems across the EEA-38 countries and the UK.
keywords: Mapping and Assessment of Ecosystems and their Services
European Catchment and Rivers Network System
